Add.summary: Creates and adds the object with the provided values.
Add.returns: A reference to the added item.s

LJCDelete.summary: Removes an item by unique values.

LJCLoad.summary: Retrieves a collection that match the supplied values.

LJCRetrieve.summary: Retrieves the collection element with unique values.
LJCRetrieve.returns: A reference to the matching item.

LJCRetrieveWithPath.summary: Retrieves the collection element with path.
LJCRetrieveWithPath.returns: A reference to the matching item.

LJCUpdate.summary: Finds and updates the collection item.

GetParentKey.summary: Retrieves the ParentKey from the object
